content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of a BurnerMiningDrill at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0), a Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0), and a Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)

### Coal mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of a BurnerMiningDrill at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a Chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of a BurnerMiningDrill at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a Chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Furnace group at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of multiple Furnaces at positions(x=40.0, y=-82.0), (x=45.0, y=-83.0), (x=42.0, y=-81.0), and (x=45.0, y=-80.0), (x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of a Lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 67}

### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of a SteamEngine at position(x=10.5, y=10.5), a Boiler at position(x=-6.0, y=24.5), an OffshorePump at position(x=-9.5, y=24.5), and multiple SmallElectricPoles

### Pipe network at position(x=10.5, y=13.5)
Consists of a PipeGroup with fluid system 32582 and multiple pipes

### Water pipe network at position(x=-8.5, y=22.5)
Consists of a PipeGroup with fluid system 32586 and multiple pipes

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items
- Ensure the chest is not full before extracting items
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when harvesting resources
- Ensure the inventory is not full before harvesting resources

### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure the fuel source is not full and the chest at the drop position is not full before continuing mining

### Errors when using furnaces
- Ensure there are ingredients to smelt before using the furnace

### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure the boiler has fuel before using it

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure there is input liquid and fluid present in connections before using the steam engine
